content: Hi, we are setting up the "Directory of published versions" to our implementation guide but is unclear for us how to set it up from a history template.
Is this for something to be hosted in the HL7 IG registry or something you're hosting yourself?

The history page is based on the package-list.json that you put in the publication folder. There is a confluence page that some of us are keeping up-to-date on non-HL7 publication process. It is not for the faint. This page explains the format and the process.
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104580055
@Jose Costa Teixeira is working on a tool to more automate this.

It's rather easy since the recent changes by @Grahame Grieve and there's only a very little part to facilitate by automation.
There's a small question/bug open - as soon as Grahame picks it up, we should have updated information.
so I expect that page will be greatly simplified soon-ish
@Jose Noguera my suggestion is to stay tuned - this is something that is being documented now and your question comes at a very good time
and watch the #IG creation stream
Jose Noguera has marked this topic as resolved.
